title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Browser Power: Building MCP Tools That Do Real Work (AIM224)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 浏览器力量：构建真正有效的MCP工具 (AIM224)
abstract: Most AI tools just retrieve info—but what if they could actually do things, like book a tennis court, fill out a form, or navigate a UI? In this talk, we’ll go beyond APIs and show how to build browser-powered MCP tools that complete real tasks. I’ll demo an MCP server on Cloudflare Workers using browser rendering to log in, solve CAPTCHAs, handle 2FA, and book a court. We’ll cover the anatomy of effective tools, lessons learned (including tool poisoning), and what makes a “real tool” vs. a brittle script—so you can design safe, composable, and useful tools in the wild. This presentation is brought to you by Cloudflare, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 大多数AI工具只是检索信息——但如果它们能够实际执行任务，比如预订网球场、填写表单或导航用户界面会怎样？在这次演讲中，我们将超越API，展示如何构建基于浏览器的MCP工具来完成实际任务。我将演示一个在Cloudflare Workers上运行的MCP服务器，使用浏览器渲染来登录、解决验证码、处理双因素认证并预订球场。我们将涵盖有效工具的结构、经验教训（包括工具中毒）以及"真正的工具"与脆弱脚本的区别——这样您就可以设计出安全、可组合且实用的野外工具。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cloudflare为您呈现。
